header.name: chaos/preprocessor/control/include_if.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro used to conditionally include a header file.

macro.abstract: The macro is used to conditionally include a header file.

usage.param: The condition that determines whether file should be included. Valid values range from 0 to .
The file to be included if cond is non-zero.

macro.para: If cond is non-zero, the file specified by file is included. Otherwise, () is included.
